params._result: uint256 Data retrieved from oracleId on the maturity

returns.buyerPayout: uint256 Payout in ratio for buyer (LONG position holder)
returns.sellerPayout: uint256 Payout in ratio for seller (SHORT position holder)

returns.buyerMargin: uint256 Margin needed from buyer (LONG position)
returns.sellerMargin: uint256 Margin needed from seller (SHORT position)

returns._0: Returns the custom name of a derivative ticker which will be used as part of the name of its positions

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._derivative: Derivative Instance of derivative to validate

returns._0: Returns boolean whether ticker is valid

allowThirdpartyExecution(bool).notice: Sets whether thirds parties are allowed or not to execute derivative's on msg.sender's behalf

getMargin((uint256,uint256,uint256[],add.notice: Calculates margin required for derivative creation
